Intruction 1: Install environment for course

Dec 9, 2018

CS320 course, we are going to use python programming in practise lession. Conveniently installation, you can initialize your environment with Anaconda ( supported Windows, Linux, and MacOS).

Install Anaconda

Fist of all, You can download installer at here. And then you can follow these instructions to install on your OS.

Install Jupyter notebook

See this post to start.
